description: cap with long back tail; black; embroidered overall with geometric designs--flower/star forms, triangles, zigzags, parallelograms; beaded rondel with maroon fabric tab at crown; metal and glass bead trim; some metal ornaments; lined in purple

medium: Cotton, beads, metal ornaments, synthetic fibers (?)
title: Head covering
